name: Castle Level 1
description: The Castle is the main building of your city. It allows you to build other buildings and train knights.

description: The Castle is the main building of your city. It allows you to build other buildings and train knights.

name: Castle Level 3
description: The Castle is the main building of your city. It allows you to build other buildings and train knights.

name: Training Camp
description: The Training Camp allows you to train swordsmen

name: Archery Range
description: The Archery Range allows you to train archers

name: Stable
description: The Stable allows you to train cavalry

name: Tower
description: The Tower increases the health and damage of units stationed inside.
